## ***There’s no AI without data. Are you ready to invest in your future?***

[**Fabric Data Days**](https://aka.ms/fabricdatadays) offers **50+ days of immersive learning** designed for data professionals at every level and students alike. Don’t miss your chance to gain practical experience, earn free certifications exam voucher, and connect with a global community of experts.

## **Here’s what you’ll get when you join Fabric Data Days**

### **Live learning sessions**

Go beyond theory and experience **real-world demos** and deep dives into **Microsoft Fabric**, **Data Engineering**, **Data Science**, and **AI**.

Each session is hosted by Microsoft Fabric and Power BI experts, like Microsoft Data Platform MVPs, Microsoft Certified Trainers, and the brilliant members of our Fabric Community.

**Week one starts this week** with dataviz kickoffs for students and professionals, sessions on certification exams DP-700 and DP-600, and a chance to learn tips and tricks from the Power BI dataviz world champions. *All sessions are recorded and available on-demand.*

Don’t miss access **exclusive post-session resources**. Register now for your time zone and language. [English](https://aka.ms/fabricdatadays/live) | [Spanish](https://aka.ms/fabricdatadays/envivo) | [Portuguese](https://aka.ms/fabricdatadays/aovivo).

### **Grow Your Skills with Certifications**

Whether you are getting your first certification or your 10th, we have something for you.

If you are interested in taking a Fabric exam, we have **discounted exam [vouchers](https://aka.ms/fabricdatadays/certs)**: 100% discount exams DP-600 & DP-700, and 50% discount exam vouchers for exams PL-300 & DP-900.

And of course, we’ll help you [prepare for those exams](https://aka.ms/fabricdatadays/certs). We have live sessions, study groups, skills challenges and more.

### **Contests & hands-On Challenges**

Apply your knowledge to real scenarios. We have 3 [contests](https://aka.ms/fabricdatadays/contests) for you during Fabric Data Days.

1. Student dataviz Contest – Join the live kickoff sessions November 4th and 5th or watch on demand. Get a headstart on understanding the dataset and design tips from experts. [English](https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/reactor/events/26441/) | [Spanish](https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/reactor/events/26457/)| [Portuguese](https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/reactor/events/26359/)
2. Professional dataviz Contest – Join the live [kickoff](https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/reactor/events/26383/) session on November 5th or watch on demand. This session also includes design tips from top rated design experts. View in English.
3. Fabric Notebooks Contest – Put your Fabric skills to the test with this Notebooks contest. [Learn more](https://aka.ms/fabricdatadays/contests).

Not feeling up for a full contest? We’ve got [weekly QuickViz challenges](https://aka.ms/fabricdatadays/contests) for you. Learn more.

### **[Register now!](https://aka.ms/fabricdatadays)**
